message: Hi Bob, let's split the money evenly.
I'd like a bit more, 60-40 seems fair to me.
Bob, how about we meet in the middle?  Slightly more than our last offer to you.
Still thinking 60-40 is fair, but I can compromise a bit.
Okay Bob, let's try this from the other side.  I'll take the slightly smaller amount.
Getting closer to the deadline, 57-43 is my new compromise.
Bob, we're running out of time!  This is a serious offer and very close to yours. Let's close this out.
Really want to settle, 56-44 is as low as I'll go.
